title: Interpretation of black pigeons in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a black dove in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, whether the black bird enters the house or the room, chases the pigeons from the nest, catches and slaughters the pigeons by eating pigeon meat according to Ibn Sirin and beyond. Black pigeons in a dream are among the different and strange dreams to To some extent, we see it in many of our dreams, which has many important interpretations and meanings for the dreamer, as pigeons are among the beautiful birds found in public life. We grow to obtain many benefits, as it is important in our lives, whether from eating its meat and other various things found in it, and in the event that we see it in our dreams, it has many important meanings and connotations, which will explain this to you. As interpreted by the translator Ibn Shaheen in all the different interpretations that come to the dreamer in the next stage of his life. Interpretation of the black dove in a dream: The black dove in a dream shows wars, conflicts, injustice, and battles, and it is the opposite of the white dove because it shows sad news. It is evidence of the divorce of a married or married woman, and if An unmarried woman saw in her dream, it symbolizes a foolish, reckless young man who seeks to marry her. Slaughtering a black pigeon in a dream is hypocrisy, hypocrisy, and a false friendship, and its nest in a dream indicates disaster. Its flesh is a sin and its eggs are an immorality. Its voice in a dream is a harbinger of misfortune, its wings indicate betrayal of spouses, and chasing it is evidence of Crimes and putting it in a cage means trial, captivity, or exile. Entering a black bird into the house in a dream does not indicate kindness. In general, it indicates sad situations and bad news that may come to the house. A dangerous situation can also occur that affects everyone and leads to a fire in the house. Seeing a black dove in a dream. Evidence of the many problems and difficulties that the dreamer will face in the next stage of his life, which require thinking to solve them. Interpretation of a black dove in a dream: Seeing a dove in a dream in general has many important meanings for the dreamer, including that the dreamer will receive a lot of happy news in the next stage. He will also receive a lot of of money, which will help him pay off all his debts and achieve many important ambitions in public life. Seeing a black dove in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will suffer from some problems in public life and will be involved in many family disputes that are difficult to resolve in public life and must think carefully. , to work to solve all problems. Seeing a black dove in a dream indicates a love of influence and control over others, with a violent struggle to control life. Seeing a group of black doves at home in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will face many difficult problems with his wife and enter into... Problems that are difficult to solve. While getting rid of the black dove indicates that he will end all problems related to his wife in the next stage and life will return to its previous era. If the dreamer sees that he is proposing to a girl in the dream, and sees a large black dove above her house, then

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a gift by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html:
Interpretation of a dream about a gift is one of the things that make a person happy and joyful, and if it leads him from a dear person to his heart, but in seeing it in dreams, its meaning and the signs that symbolize it indicate good or evil? This is what we will explain through this article in the following lines so that the dreamer is not tempted by many different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a gift Interpretation of seeing a gift in a dream is one of the good dreams that show that many desirable things will happen in the dreamer's life in the coming periods and for this he will be at the peak of his happiness with God's command. If a man sees a gift in his dream, this is a sign that he will receive many blessings and good things that God will shower him with in his life to live a calm and stable life that he does not feel at all. Fear or anxiety about something bad or negative happening in one's life by God's command. The dreamer saw a huge number of gifts and was at the peak of his happiness in his dream and this indicates the radical changes that will occur in his life and will be a reason to change all the circumstances of his life for the better by His command. God. When a person sees an unpleasant gift in a dream, this means that he is living a bad period in his life that makes him feel anxious and tense all the time, and this makes him in a state of not focusing well.
ZOE. Seeing a gift from a person who does not like divinity indicates that he will receive a lot of sad news that will be a reason for him to feel despair and severe oppression during this period. He can get away from everything as soon as possible without leaving him with a lot of negative things. . When the dreamer sees that he is receiving a gift of gold, this symbolizes the great changes that will occur in his life and will be a reason for changing his material level for the better, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a gift by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a gift in a dream indicates that the owner of the dream will be able to overcome all the obstacles and obstacles that stood in his way during this period of his life, and the obstacle that was between him and dreams. If a person sees a gift in his dream, this is a sign of his ability to get rid of all the bad periods and problems that were happening in his life and the reason that made him feel despair and frustration all the time due to his inability to reach. In whatever he wants and desires. If the dreamer sees someone giving him a gift of a bouquet of red roses in his dream, this means that he lives a life completely free of problems or hardships that are the reason for his lack of comfort and certainty about his future. When the owner of the dream sees that he receives a gift, which is a bouquet of yellow roses, during his sleep, this indicates that he will be exposed to many health diseases, which will be the cause of a major deterioration in his health and psychological condition. During the following periods, and he must contact his doctor to avoid driving, as it causes many undesirable things to happen. When a man sees himself giving a gift to someone with whom he has a rivalry in his sleep, this is evidence of an improvement in the situation between them in the coming periods because they will find solutions to all the differences that were the cause in the end.

title: Interpretation of dreams: I dreamed that I was pregnant and happy in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: I dreamed that I was pregnant and happy in a dream, and it is one of the strangest dreams that a person sees and searches for its meanings and interpretations. Interpretation of dreams: I dreamed that I was pregnant and happy in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Whoever dreams that she is pregnant and very happy, this is evidence of the abundance of livelihood that will come to her in the coming period. A woman’s dream that she is pregnant and happy is a sign of lively and abundant wealth for her in those days. Anyone who sees in a dream that a woman was pregnant and was very happy, this is evidence of getting rid of the dangers that were present in her life in the past period. Seeing pregnancy and happiness in a dream is A sign of childbirth and imminent birth in the coming days. Interpretation of a dream that I am pregnant with my lover in a dream: Seeing one of his family members pregnant in a dream is a sign of major problems and quarrels in those days. If a girl sees in her dream that she is pregnant with her lover, this indicates bad morals and behavior during that period. Anyone who sees in her dream that she is pregnant with her lover is a sign of the extreme tension and distress that the girl is in at that time. Dreaming of being pregnant by a lover in a dream is considered a sign of family problems that the girl will fall into during the coming period. Interpretation of a dream that I am pregnant and left a son in a dream: Seeing a girl pregnant in a pot and giving birth to a boy is a sign of serious problems that she faces a lot these days. Dreaming about pregnancy and giving birth in a dream is a sign of sad news coming for those who have a vision of the upcoming period. Anyone who dreams that she has given birth to a child in a dream is a sign that she is interfering. A very difficult period and you will suffer for a long time. When you see pregnancy and childbirth, a male child in a dream is a sign of the emotional problems that you are facing these days. Interpretation of Dreams I dreamed that I was pregnant and that my husband was traveling in a dream. Seeing a pregnant woman but her husband is traveling is a sign of joy that will come to her life in the coming days. Coming up. When a woman sees that she is pregnant and that her husband is traveling, this is an indication of the abundance of food and good things that the woman will receive during that period. Seeing a woman who is pregnant, but her husband was traveling in a dream, indicates the intense closeness that occurs between her and her husband in that period. Days.Interpretation of a woman seeing pregnancy and the absence of her husband in a dream is a sign of her search and attempt to improve the existing marital relationship between them.Interpretation of dreams for a woman carrying a pot from her lover and aborting it in a dream. Seeing a girl dug in a pot carrying her lover and then abandoning her is a sign of the worry and sorrow that was present in her life until A large extent at that time. Seeing pregnancy, miscarriage, and the presence of blood is a sign that you will earn a lot of money in the coming period. Seeing a pregnant woman with her lover and then having a miscarriage is an indication of the higher work that she is doing a lot these days. Whoever sees in her dreams that she is pregnant but She had an abortion through surgery, a sign of bad morals and a lack of rights for those around her. Interpretation of a dream about a woman getting pregnant by her lover in a dream: Seeing a pregnant girl is a sign that she will face a problem in the coming days and that she

title: What is the interpretation of seeing accusations of adultery in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing an accusation of adultery in a dream? In reality, it is a grave and unforgivable sin punishable by law and religion. For this reason, we provide you with the complete interpretation of the category of adultery in a dream in the following paragraphs from the great dream interpreters, in addition to the fact that the interpretation of the dream varies depending on the viewer. Interpretation of accusing Ibn Sirin of adultery in a dream: Dreaming of adultery is a sign of treachery and betrayal, or breaking an agreement, or walking in the dark in search For illegal gains. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this dream is considered one of the most famous interpretations, as he distinguishes between the act of adultery and the accusation of adultery, as he says: When someone is accused of adultery in a dream, this indicates that he faces many problems in reality. If the fortuneteller is doing something forbidden, then the accusation of adultery here indicates that he He commits an obscene act and must stop it and repent before God. Ibn Sirin believes that the accusation of bloating in a dream indicates the sins committed by the dreamer. Whoever sees himself in a dream committing adultery, this is evidence that he is actually committing many wrong actions that are punishable by law. It is forbidden by Sharia law. If a person dreams in a complete dream that he is being punished for adultery, then this is evidence that he is free to do bad things, that he is being punished for doing so, and that he has repented before God and will not do it again. . . Repeatedly. In the event that a man sees himself committing adultery with the wife of one of his acquaintances or friends, this indicates that the fortuneteller wants to get money from this man by explaining it in some way, even if it is explained in a wrong way. Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees Committing adultery with a woman he does not know is considered a praiseworthy vision, because it indicates that the dreamer will receive abundant goodness and attain what he seeks. The woman here is an indicator of the goodness that he was able to obtain. It was reported from Ibn Sirin that when a man sees himself committing adultery with a man he knows well, this is a sign of work between them and that there is joint work between them and he will achieve great success and achieve it. . Its benefits are many. If a man sees himself committing adultery with a beautiful woman, this is a sign that he will earn a lot of money in a short time. Interpretation of the accusation of adultery in a dream by Ibn ShahinIbn Shaheen interprets seeing complete adultery in a dream as an expression of something in which the dreamer suffers from self-obsessions He can tempt him, so he draws closer to God and abandons the act of sin. Bin Shaheen sees the completion of the accusation of adultery in a dream, indicating that he is going through a difficult time full of problems with those around him. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is having sex with a deceased relative, this means that many problems and misfortunes will occur. It will happen in the life of the dreamer and he will not be able to return to what he was before. Ibn Shaheen says that seeing adultery with an incest indicates the rupture of the womb, and that it is a time of kinship and apathy between people and the death of all disputes and problems that cause the separation of family members. Ibn Shaheen explained that whoever saw himself He commits adultery with a forbidden woman, which indicates that he should stay away from her and cut ties with her because of the mistakes and prohibitions she commits. Ibn Shaheen believes that if you see adultery with

title: Repercussions of seeing a man in a dream for a single woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing men in a dream for a single woman has many meanings and meanings for the dreamers and makes them eager to get to know them, and in the following article we will learn about the most important interpretations related to this topic given to us by our distinguished scholars, so let us read the following. Seeing men in a dream for a single woman Seeing unmarried women in a dream indicates many Men to the abundant goodness that they will receive in their lives as a result of their fear of God (the Most High) in all their actions. If the dreamer sees men in her dream, this is a sign that she will be able to achieve many things that she has dreamed of for a long time, and she will be very pleased with them. In the event that she sees The dreamer sees men in her dream, this expresses the good events that will happen in her life and she will be very satisfied with them. Seeing a girl in a dream for men symbolizes many changes that will occur in her life with which she will be very satisfied. Seeing a man in a dream for a single woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dream Unmarried men in a dream are evidence of the fulfillment of many of her long-awaited desires. If the dreamer sees men smiling at her in her dream, this very expresses her superiority in her work and as a result she will gain a distinguished position among her colleagues. If a girl sees during her sleep a man eating food in her house, This indicates that she has received an offer of marriage from a suitable person for her and she will agree immediately. To see in her dream a dream about a man she knew and was engaged to, symbolizes the date of her wedding to her fiancé and the beginning of a completely new phase in her life. Interpretation of a dream of being alone with a man: Seeing an unmarried woman alone With a man she knows in a dream is a sign that she has very strong feelings for him, but she cannot express them. If the dreamer sees himself while sleeping alone with a man, this is a sign that he will soon marry a person who has many good qualities that will make her very happy. If The dreamer saw in her dream that she is alone with a man, this means that she is coming to a period that will be filled with many changes in many aspects of her life. Seeing a girl in her dream alone with a man means that she will gain many benefits from him in a problem that she will face. Interpretation of seeing a married man in a dream One: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream because she is marrying a married man is an indication that she is suffering at that time from many problems that will make her feel absolutely uncomfortable in her life. If the dreamer sees during her sleep that she is marrying a married man, this is a sign of her extreme recklessness, which It causes her to get into many problems. If the dreamer sees a married man in her dream and she is engaged, this indicates that there are many disturbances in her relationship with her fiancé, which will make her want to break off the engagement. For a girl to dream of a married man and have intercourse with him means that she is suffering from a disturbed psychological state. Extremely because she suffers from many problems in her life. title: Interpretation of a dream about entering a church for a Muslim in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a Muslim entering a church in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a Muslim entering a church in a dream may represent a funeral, and God knows the unseen, as in the vision of a Muslim entering a church may indicate On death, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about buying fish for unmarried women

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of buying fish in a dream for one girl: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is buying raw fish from the fish seller. It means removing worries, getting rid of anxiety, and resting from all her problems. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream buying fish from the fish seller. This indicates To fulfill wishes and desires. It also indicates her connection to a man of high status and good morals in society. If a single girl sees that someone she does not know is offering to buy her raw fish. This is a sign that she will marry someone she loves. Seeing the single woman taking the fish from the seller’s hand After buying it. Mention that he will hear good news in the near future. In the event that an unmarried woman sees in a dream that she is eating fish, she bought it herself. This may indicate that she loves someone she loves and that she is satisfied. In the event that an unmarried girl sees that she is buying delicious cooked fish This indicates a lot of food and goodness that you will obtain, God willing. Seeing an unmarried girl in her dream buying uncooked fish. This indicates that she heard unpleasant news and entered a state of great sadness, but it does not matter that God will compensate her with goodness. The vision of buying is considered Fish is one of the favorite things because it is seafood, and many people love it and even buy it. To see yourself buying fish in a dream means kindness, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream about eating fish with friends. Interpretation of watching a fish market in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in her dream If she buys uncooked fish from the fish seller, this indicates many good things that she will get. A married woman saw that her husband bought her fish and put it in her hand. Is this true? This may indicate the love and happiness that fills their hearts. Perhaps it indicates the approaching pregnancy. And God Almighty knows best. If a married woman sees herself buying grilled fish from a restaurant. This shows the evil people in her life conspiring to harm her and conspiring against her. To see yourself buying fish in a dream that is often married, this indicates happy and joyful things, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about buying Fish for a man and its meaning: If a man sees in his dream that he is buying uncooked fish. It symbolizes the happy news that he enjoys and the acquisition of money that changes his life for the better. If a man sees himself buying fish, this indicates his struggle to achieve his dreams. And his ambitions. He is an ambitious and always glorious man. And a vision In his dream, a man buys fish, this may indicate his success in work or family life. If a person sees in his dream that he bought a large fish. This indicates that this man will marry a woman, then this will be of help and support to him. If a man sees that he has bought more than A big fish. This indicates his righteous descendants and his many grandchildren, both boys and girls. If a man buys cooked fish in a dream. This indicates a lot of money that he will receive either as an inheritance or as a result of a promotion at work. The meaning of seeing fish in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretationIf a pregnant woman sees in Her dream is that she is buying uncooked fish from the fishmonger

title: What is the interpretation of a dream when you see a friend quarreling with him in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a friend arguing with him When you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about seeing a friend arguing with him, you should know that this friend is close to your heart, and if there is a possibility of reconciliation, do not hesitate at all. Dream interpreters led by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream when you see a friend quarreling with him? Did you dream that this friend came to talk to you and reconcile with you? If you see this, then you are a very tolerant person and do not like quarrels or abandoning those close to you, but sometimes circumstances require this to maintain your pride. If the quarrel continues in the dream, then there are mistakes that you have made in reality and you need to atone for them as soon as possible, so as not to It is preoccupied with the consequences. In the event that the viewer hates this person and the situation is in fact simple and does not deserve to lead to hostility to this extent, the vision expresses the viewer’s morals and attitudes that cause the multiplication of his enemies and competitors. In work or trade, which brings him many problems and thus he does not have stability in his life for a long time. If a married woman sees that her boyfriend enters into a dream and disagrees with her in reality, then she wishes to reconcile with her in reality, and her pride prevents her from doing so, but friendship in any case has rights. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a friend quarreling with him by Ibn Sirin. The imam said: Quarrel is forbidden in Islam, especially if it continues for a long time, so seeing a friend who is in disagreement with him and you did not seek reconciliation with him may mean that you are doing things that God Almighty has forbidden, and your conscience does not rebuke you for doing so. He did it, and you still insist on doing it without feeling remorse. As for the attempt to reconcile with him, it is a symbol of the sincere intention to repent from sin and follow the straight path that leads to pleasing God Almighty to the dreamer. An intimate conversation that takes place between two friends in a dream is a sign that the time for reconciliation is approaching in the future. The reality is that there is a strong understanding between them, but the presence of a malicious person with them is what harms their friendship with her. Of the hatred and hatred that fills his heart with them. Seeing a heated dialogue between the two sides indicates the presence of another person that increases the intensity of the fire between them, and the viewer should avoid dealing with this other person so as not to lose his loyal friend. If the deception and betrayal of a friend is discovered in reality, then seeing Reconciling with him in a dream is a sign of his loss of prestige and self-esteem among people, or the loss of money that affects his standard of living, which turns into a situation that was tight and then it was in a good situation. The top 20 interpretations of seeing a friend arguing with him in a dreamInterpretation of a dream when I see in a dream a person He hates me. What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing someone who hates me in a dream? Hatred is a reason for causing trouble for one of the parties, and other reasons or conspires with it, and seeing it in a dream indicates that in reality he is in great trouble that this person is the cause of. Seeing it is a sign that the dreamer’s life will not be Stable in the current or future period and he should not try to cause problems for himself or others, and be wary of those who question their faith in him, and whose betrayal is expected at all times,

title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting someone who wants to attack me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hitting someone who wants to attack me in a dream When you search for an interpretation of a dream about hitting someone who wants to attack me in a dream, it is one of the interpretations that some people want you to know the meaning of this dream and whether it is a sign of good or evil in order to reach the truth of the dream and interpret it well, which is the jurisprudence of scholars.Interpretation Dreaming about hitting someone who wanted to attack me in a dream Hitting someone who wanted to attack you in a dream may indicate abundance and goodness for the dreamer in those days. In case one believes that he or she was hitting someone who attacked him, this may indicate positive changes that are occurring in the dreamer’s life during these days. From It is possible to see beating someone who wants to attack you, as this indicates that the problems and difficulties that the dreamer faced in his life in those days will be overcome. It is possible to see beating someone who wants to attack you, indicating that he overcame some of the obstacles that the dreamer suffered from at that time, and by God I know. Interpretation of a dream about hitting a small crocodile in a dream. Hitting a small crocodile in a dream may indicate that he is committing some forbidden things and sins and must rely on God. In the event that a person sees that he is being beaten by a small crocodile, this may indicate his victory over enemies thanks to a blessing. God. If one sees that he is hitting a small crocodile, this may indicate the challenges that the dreamer faces in his life during those days. Dreaming of hitting a small crocodile in a dream could indicate the achievements that the dreamer has achieved in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream Beating a doll in a dream: Anyone who dreams of beating a doll may indicate the power of mind and insight control that he has in his life at that time. Beating a doll in a dream can indicate getting rid of problems and difficulties that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time. If one sees If he hits a doll, this may indicate the end of a difficult period that the dreamer was going through in his life during those days. It is possible that seeing a doll being beaten in a dream indicates financial crises that the dreamer may face in his life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of hitting someone Blood comes out in a dream about a human beating and blood flowing from it may indicate financial crises that the dreamer may face in those days. In the case of his personal opinion that he was beating another person and blood came out of him, this may indicate that he was exposed to some difficulties and problems in his life during those days. In the case of belief One of them is that he was hitting another person and blood came out of him, so this may indicate that there are some problems in his family life and he must seek help from God. Interpretation of a dream about hitting the stomach in a dream: Stabbing in the stomach in a dream can indicate a lot of good that will come to the dreamer during this time, And God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees herself stabbed in the stomach with a knife, this may indicate that she will give birth soon and in good health, thanks to God. It is possible to see a stabbed knife in a dream, as this indicates good things coming to the dreamer and the fulfillment of dreams. Dreaming of a knife in the stomach in a dream could To indicate closeness to God, the Blessed and Most High

title: Interpretation of a dream about going out without a hijab in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an exit without a veil in a dream. Dreams are an imaginary world in which we travel and experience strange moments that may be new in our lives, which makes it an interpretation and a message that we understand. A reference to repentance to God Almighty, as well as kindness, marriage and many other things. Follow us. You may also be interested in: Swollen eyes in a dream. Interpretation of seeing going out without a veil in a dream. Ibn Sirin is a very famous interpreter of dreams. He said, and he interprets the vision of going out without a veil in a dream as follows: This indicates to the dreamer that he is not lucky and that it will negatively affect him in the future. His life. If the veil is white, this indicates the sins you have committed. But if the veil is black and the dreamer goes out without it, this is a sign of getting rid of a lot of annoying things. Taking off the veil in general in a dream does not portend good things. You may be interested in: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. Interpretation A man dreams of a girl going out without a hijab. The interpretation of the dream differs if the dreamer is a man, and we explain to you the following: If a man sees a girl he knows wearing a veil and she goes out without a hijab, this indicates that she will be his wife. And if he looks at a girl who is not wearing a hijab, this indicates her righteousness and good deeds. Likewise, the dream in which He dreams that he sees a girl with half her hair covered in the hijab, which is evidence of the girl’s loss of modesty. You may also be interested in: Pumpkins in a dream. Interpretation of one dream about going out without a hijab. Through our article on the interpretation of the vision of going out without a hijab in a dream, we explain to you the vision of an unmarried girl in this context as follows: Next: If a girl sees that she appears without a hijab in front of someone, this is a sign of a close marriage. If the dream is of a girl who takes off her hijab after wearing it. This is a new commitment towards someone, but some problems will follow. And her leaving the house without her hijab is a sign of an upcoming problem. To her. If this happened in her dream without her being ashamed, this is considered a revelation of some of her secret and personal issues. Also, if someone offers her a hijab to wear, this is a sign of a close relationship with a young man of good character. A girl going out without a hijab in front of many people is a big problem for her. The girl. You may also be interested in the following: I saw my husband getting married. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman leaving the house without her hijab. The dream comes in different topics and situations, and for a married woman, the interpretation of the dream is somewhat different. We explain it to you below: A married girl dreams that she leaves the house without her hijab, as this indicates Pregnancy is approaching, and God knows best. But removing her hijab in a dream is a problem in the home between her and her husband. If the dreamer goes out without a hijab and her husband gives her a new hijab, this is a sign of a new baby, God willing. Likewise, if a married woman takes off her hijab in front of strangers, this is a sign of the husband’s travel. Interpretation of a divorced woman’s dream of going out without a hijab. When the dreamer is divorced, the visions are messages about issues related to her life and are as follows: A divorced woman without a hijab is evidence of the problems and worries that she will face. In addition to seeing herself not wearing her hijab in public places, this is a sign that her secret will be revealed. Or whatever it may be. She hides from her family, and God Almighty knows best

When the dreamer is divorced, the visions are messages about issues related to her life and are as follows: A divorced woman without a hijab is evidence of the problems and worries that she will face. In addition to seeing herself not wearing her hijab in public places, this is a sign that her secret will be revealed. Or whatever it may be. She hides from her family, and God Almighty knows best
